input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.img: Steubenville City School District was established in 1839. The District has been heralded for excellence, leadership, commitment and tradition. We take great pride in our positions and the opportunity to provide excellence in education for all of our students. I share your deep commitment to ensuring your child and every learner is inspired, challenged, and engaged at Steubenville City Schools each and every day. Effective instruction for all students will require an unwavering focus and a commitment to collaborate in order to increase student performance. In partnership, teachers, administrators, staff and our families can create that educational environment by nurturing and inspiring each child in our district toward their journey to fulfill his or her dream.

span.div:
- Mrs. Young
District Office
1400 W. Adams St.
Steubenville, OH 43952
Phone: (740) 283-3767

div.a: Algebra, Biology, American History, American Gov. (AIR Test)
